full_name: Scenario V: Return to Undimensioned and Unseen

steps.text: Remove 4 copies of Brood of Yog-Sothoth from the original scenario and replace them with the 4 new versions of Brood of Yog-Sothoth from the Return to Undimensioned and Unseen encounter set. For the duration of the scenario

For the duration of this scenario, the following additional rule applies:
"If a Brood of Yog-Sothoth would be put into play, it is chosen at random from among the set-aside versions of Brood of Yog-Sothoth."
Attach the Return to Undimensioned and Unseen scenario reference card to the scenario reference card as a reminder.

Put 1 random copy of Brood of Yog‐Sothoth into play in Cold Spring Glen and put 1 random copy of Brood of Yog‐Sothoth into play in Blasted Heath. Then, set the final 3 copies of Brood of Yog‐Sothoth aside, out of play.

Put 1 random copy of Brood of Yog‐Sothoth into play in Cold Spring Glen, and set 3 random copies of Brood of Yog‐Sothoth aside, out of play. Then, remove the final copy of Brood of Yog‐Sothoth from the game.

Put 1 random copy of Brood of Yog‐Sothoth into play in Cold Spring Glen, and set 2 random copies of Brood of Yog‐Sothoth aside, out of play. Then, remove the final 2 copies of Brood of Yog‐Sothoth from the game.
Set 2 random copies of Brood of Yog‐Sothoth aside, out of play. Then, remove the final 3 random copies of Brood of Yog‐Sothoth from the game.
